data.displayName: GloBird  Combo GLOGREEN Residential (Flat Rate  Without Controlled Load)-Citipower

fees.description: This is smart meter remote re-connection fee. It assumes a smart meter being remotely connected during business hours when we have been given enough prior notice.  However the fee can vary depending on the type of meter, the location, and other factors.
This is smart meter remote disconnection fee, however this fee can vary depending on your type of meter, the meter location, and other factors.
Paper Bill. If you have opted to receive a paper bill by post

electricityContract.terms: This contingent offer is for new residential customers when bundled with one of GloBird's eligible gas plans. For further information about this offer call GloBird on 133456 or visit www.globirdenergy.com.au or see our full terms and conditions here: www.globirdenergy.com.au/legal/. See Time of Use Solar/Generation time period here https://www.globirdenergy.com.au/legal/flexible/.

discounts.description: Discounts only apply when the condition is met. 2% when you pay the bill by the due date. 2% when you have both an active gas and electricity account for the same premises on one account when you pay the bill by the due date, and 1% when you pay the bill by the due date with direct debit.

electricityContract.variation: We may update your rates from time to time, usually at the same time as the state Government reset the Victorian Default Offer, and review your solar feed-in when the minimum feed-in laws change. We'll always notify you in writing prior to any change

incentives.description: Local call center and no credit card processing fees
incentives.displayName: Local call center and no credit card processing fees
incentives.eligibility: Traditional energy plan. Easy to understand. Local call center. No sneaky credit card processing fees. Just great value.
100% of the carbon emissions associated with this plan will be offset so you can enjoy guilt free energy.

eligibility.information: Contingent offer for new Residential customers on single-rate tariff in Citipower area. Transacting via friendly Australian based customer care team or online and paying zero credit card processing fees. Step 1 of 608.33kWh/month is based on accumulated daily allowance of 20.00kWh/day for the billing period.

solarFeedInTariff.description: 4-9pm we pay 5.2c/kWh, 10am-2pm we pay 5.2c, other times we pay 5.2c
You can remain on the scheme until 31 December 2024

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: No contract term, no exit fees. You can switch to another provider without penalty. We will always notify you before we change your discount percentage or rates.
